title: Publications
text: My research focuses on Science of Science, Complex Networks, and Academic Career Development. I use data-driven approaches to understand how mentorship, team size, and network structures affect scientific survival and success in the life-course view.

title: Yanmeng Xing
text:
I am a researcher at Beijing Normal University, specializing in Science of Science, Complex Networks, and Scientometrics. My research explores the fundamental patterns of scientific career development, mentorship dynamics, and the evolution of scientific knowledge.
My recent work, published in Nature Human Behaviour, investigates how the size of academic groups influences the survival and success of mentees, a study that has been featured by Nature News.
